author: theFox
long_description:
This is a mod containing some useful chat commands:
**8ball**: write a question as parameter and the mod will answer whether it will come true  
**8ball_quiet**: like 8ball but not shouting it out to the whole server  
**choose**: choses a random item from a ";" seperated list (spaces allowed)  
**leet**: convert a text to leetspeak, first write the severity level (1-6) then the text  
Feel free to request more commands in issues or in a thread here...
name: chat_tools
short_description: chat commands that people might need
title: Chat Tools
